title: Twisted Mythology: Hades
description: Out of both boredom and a desire to learn more about the souls he governs, Hades decides to spend time in a mortal city, choosing the city of Larissa in Thessaly. There he encounters the nymph Minthe and a mortal guardsman named Arcadius who has the weapon's skills that will prove useful when the mortal's soul eventually reaches the Underworld.
author: Ashleigh Matthews
